trans_title: 埃及失落宝藏 第四季
La valle dei Re - Tesori nascosti(意)
Les Trésors Perdus de la Vallée des Rois(法)
Secrets of Egypt's Valley of the Kings
Tal der Könige: Ägyptens verlorene Schätze(德)
甦る！エジプトに眠る財宝(日)
introduction: Egypt is home to the richest source of archaeological treasures on the planet. In this series, our cameras follow teams across Egypt on the front line of archaeology, through a full season of excavations. Crawling beneath pyramids, uncovering long lost tombs and unearthing 3000 year-old mummies, the world’s top archaeologists race to unlock the secrets of this ancient civilization.1. Tutankhamun’s Death2. Secrets Of the Nile3. Ramses: Egypt’s Greatest Dynasty4. Mummy Hunters5. Secrets Of The Lost Pyramids6. Alexander The Great7. Rise of Cleopatra8. Rise of the Pyramids
chinese_title: 埃及失落宝藏 第四季
